data.eml:eml: Mexican species of the genus Probles Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tersilochinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I., Ruíz-Cancino, Enrique (2019): Mexican species of the genus Probles Förster (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Tersilochinae). Zootaxa 4619 (2): 201-230, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4619.2.1
